name: Marvin JACKSON, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Jackson v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Marvin JACKSON, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 26th day of September, 2003, probable jurisdiction is noted. The order of June 25, 2003 is reversed and the matter is remanded for consideration of the merits in Commonwealth Court’s appellate jurisdiction.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
832 A.2d 1013
Marvin JACKSON, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 26, 2003.
